name: The Milky Way (KingFaiz77)
description: “The Milky Way” is a game that puts players on an adventure in an endless space. Players must navigate through a variety of obstacles as they try to outrun the dangers of space. The game features fast-paced gameplay and a variety of collectibles to help players progress through the game. With its engaging and challenging gameplay levels, “The Milky Way” is a must-play for fans of the endless runner genre. :)
